GSD.description:
hfs: fix OOB Read in __hfs_brec_find

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit 4fd3a11804c8877ff11fec59c5c53f1635331e3e. For more details please see the references link.
